title: Down-Pointing Small Red Triangle

adjectives: Being or moving lower in position or less in some value
verbs: To transfer (computer data, especially as one or more files) from a remote computer (server) to a local computer, usually via a network.
Transfer a file or program from a central computer to a smaller computer or to a computer at a remote location
Transfer data from a server to the local computer.
To transfer data from a remote computer to a local one.
To transfer a copy of a file from a remote device to a requesting device by means of a modem or network.
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description:
A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing down. Styled similarly to the left and right pointing triangles and colored as either gray or blue, but shown in orange on Android.

Previously displayed as red on Windows.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's downwards button emoji presents a clean, sharp arrow pointing resolutely down, its surface finished with a smooth gradient and subtle highlights that emphasize its directional purpose and tactile feel. On Apple devices, the design features soft rounded edges, giving it a modern and intuitive appearance, perfect for indicating selection, navigation, or a downward scroll. This emoji on Apple devices is a clear and direct visual cue, commonly used to guide users or signify a descent in content.
